739cb722-8ce2-4e96-b97b-e0a72f552cdb:
Benefit: Choose one type of ranged weapon. You do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} when firing the selected weapon while {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threatened{/g}.
Normal: Using a ranged weapon while you are threatened provokes {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} of opportunity.
